p: {4-[2-(3-Amino-phenyl)-pyrazolo[1,5-a]pyridin-3-yl]-pyrimidin-2-yl}-(3-fluoro-phenyl)-amine (80 mg, 0.20 mmol) was acylated with 2-chloro-3,6-difluorobenzoyl chloride (30 µL, 0.22 mmol) in a manner analogous to Example 11, to give the title compound as an orange solid (80 mg, 70%). HRMS calculated C 30H 18ClF 3N 6O [M+H] + 571.1261 found 571.1267.
